# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment
-  Ensure that burner equipment has fuel before using it
### Errors when using stone furnaces
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the power grid before using them
### Errors when using electricity groups
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before using them
### Errors when using pipe groups
-  Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before using them
### Errors when using belt groups
-  Ensure that belt groups are not empty before using them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined by the agent.
